body_html:
@ChinaMobileNG - you complied with VERBS support (this is what you wanted right ?)
and in this case you need to install IB verbs SW stack (libibverbs and all of it kernel dependencies == OFED or MLNX_OFED if using Mellanox devices)

body:
@ChinaMobileNG  - you complied with VERBS support (this is what you wanted right ?) 
and in this case you need to install IB verbs SW stack (libibverbs and all of it kernel dependencies == OFED or MLNX_OFED if using Mellanox devices)
